system.description:
You have studied both the workings of traditional magic and magic items and can sometimes combine them. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence increases by +1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Choose a number of Artificer spells equal to your Intelligence modifier. You learn them as Wizard spells and add them to your spellbook, even if they aren’t normally on the Wizard list. If they are not on the normal Wizard list, other Wizards cannot copy them from your spellbook.
  • When you use Arcane Recovery, you can choose to repair a spell invention at the cost of a spell slot of the level of spell tied to it. For example, repairing a spell invention that casts blur would count as recovering a 2nd-level spell slot. You may only repair one spell invention this way per use of Arcane Recovery.
